actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to provide memorial plots in national cemeteries for certain former members of the Armed Forces and to permit the adjacent burial of certain family members of such former members.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to provide memorial plots in national cemeteries for former members of the Armed Forces whose remains are determined to be nonrecoverable. Permits the adjacent burial of the surviving spouse, minor child, and unmarried adult child at the discretion of the Secretary of such former members.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to provide memorial plots in national cemeteries for certain former members of the Armed Forces and to permit the adjacent burial of certain family members of such former members.
